about_the_game:
COMPLETE PACK
  • 3990 Platinum
  • LAVOS PRIME: Some Warframes were Prime from the start. Others ascended. Lavos, the master of transmutation, bowed to no one as he forged his own path to valor.
  • CEDO PRIME: A golden shotgun, forged for those who deliver judgment.
  • DUAL ZOREN PRIME: Axes worthy of an executioner, refined to Orokin perfection.
  • NIMANDI PRIME ARMOR: Command fear and respect as you safeguard what matters most, clad in this indomitable Orokin armor.
  • VITAM PRIME SYANDANA: Transmute the chaos of battle into golden triumph.
  • EXCLUSIVE LAVOS PRIME GLYPH
  • 90-Day Affinity Booster
  • 90-Day Resource Booster

Prime Warframes and Weapons in Prime Access can also be crafted from parts found in Relics in-game.

This pack can only be purchased as part of a bundle.
detailed_description:
COMPLETE PACK
  • 3990 Platinum
  • LAVOS PRIME: Some Warframes were Prime from the start. Others ascended. Lavos, the master of transmutation, bowed to no one as he forged his own path to valor.
  • CEDO PRIME: A golden shotgun, forged for those who deliver judgment.
  • DUAL ZOREN PRIME: Axes worthy of an executioner, refined to Orokin perfection.
  • NIMANDI PRIME ARMOR: Command fear and respect as you safeguard what matters most, clad in this indomitable Orokin armor.
  • VITAM PRIME SYANDANA: Transmute the chaos of battle into golden triumph.
  • EXCLUSIVE LAVOS PRIME GLYPH
  • 90-Day Affinity Booster
  • 90-Day Resource Booster

Prime Warframes and Weapons in Prime Access can also be crafted from parts found in Relics in-game.

This pack can only be purchased as part of a bundle.
legal_notice: Warframe and the Warframe logo are registered trademarks of Digital Extremes Ltd.
name: Warframe: Lavos Prime Access - Complete Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows 7 64-Bit (32-bit not supported)
  • Processor:Intel Core i7 860, Intel Core i5 750, or AMD FX-4100 (SSE 4.2 support required)
  • Video:DirectX 11+ capable Graphics Card
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Storage:50 GB available HD space
  • Internet:Broadband Internet Connection Required

Note: There is no Mac or Linux client currently available.

short_description: Add a full suite of the Orokin's finest to your Arsenal instantly. The Complete Pack includes 3990 Platinum, Lavos Prime, Cedo Prime, Dual Zoren Prime, an exclusive Lavos Prime Glyph, Lavos Prime Accessories, 90-Day Affinity and Resource Boosters and much more.
supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Korean, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Thai
*languages with full audio support
